message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to consider acquiring this exceptional item. We are offering the product for $1350000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $1200000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of this, I am proposing an adjusted price of $1250000 for the product. This still represents a significant premium over its intrinsic value to you, while allowing us to close the deal. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.
